</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attempts to move given waypoint to a random position inside a circle with the given center and radius. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> If you are looking for the command to set precise WP position, see [[setWPPos]]</value></part></template><br>
The waypoint will be placed similar to <tt>"NONE"</tt> attribute in [[setVehiclePosition]], even if the radius is 0, which means it could still be off center. In order to force waypoint to the exact position, similar to <tt>"CAN_COLLIDE"</tt> attribute, use negative radius, like -1 for example. You will probably laugh at this, but be warned:
<template lineStart="1"><title> Warning </title><part><name index="1"/><value> When using negative radius, the center position supplied must be [[PositionASL]], only then the resulting [[waypointPosition]] will be in format [[PositionAGL]] and not buried under the ground ¯\_(ツ)_/¯</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWaypointPosition''' [center, radius] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [center, radius]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> center: [[PositionAGL]] or [[Object]] (or [[PositionASL]] if the radius is negative) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - random placement radius in meters. Set it to -1 and convert center to [[PositionASL]] for the exact center placement. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
